settings.title: Settings
settings.hiddenModulesNote: Hidden modules will no longer appear in the navigation menu.
settings.languageNote: The interface will be translated to the selected language.
settings.dateFormatNote: Date display format throughout the application
settings.marketStructureDesc: Choose a structure to compare prices against Jita.

auth.secureAuth: Secure authentication via EVE Online SSO
auth.noCredentialsShared: Your credentials are never shared with this application
auth.authFailedMaintenance: Authentication failed - EVE servers may be under maintenance
auth.cannotConnect: Cannot connect - EVE servers may be under maintenance
auth.eveMaintenanceTitle: EVE Online servers are under maintenance
auth.esiMaintenanceMode: ESI is currently in maintenance mode

header.rateLimitBanner: ESI rate limit reached - ESI actions blocked for {seconds}s

characters.title: Characters
characters.subtitle: Manage your EVE Online characters and authorizations
characters.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this character? All associated data will be deleted.
characters.confirmSetMainMessage: This character will become your main character. Corporation data will be based on this character.

pi.title: Planetary Interaction
pi.subtitle: PI colony management
pi.syncTooltip: Updates the local cache from ESI. Data reflects your last in-game interaction.
pi.noColoniesDescription: No colonies detected. Click "Sync" to load your PI data from ESI, or verify your characters have the Planetary Interaction scope.

kpi.onCharacters: across {count} character | across {count} character | across {count} characters

alerts.extractorsExpired: {count} extractor expired | {count} extractor expired | {count} extractors expired

production.title: Global production by tier
production.footnote: Theoretical production: qty_per_cycle x (3600 / cycle_time) x 24, chained via SDE schematics, valued at Jita 4-4 sell prices (updated every 2h)
production.jitaSellPriceTooltip: Valuation based on sell orders at Jita 4-4, updated every 2h

colony.noDetail: No details available for this colony. Sync to load installation data.

pve.subtitle: PVE income and expense tracking
pve.npcRevenueLastDays: NPC revenue for the last {days} days
pve.ammoConfigDescription: Define which item types to scan as ammo expenses in your wallet transactions.
pve.lootTypesDescription: Define which item types to scan as loot sales in your wallet transactions.
pve.lootScanSummary: {transactions} transactions, {contracts} contracts, {projects} projects scanned - {detected} sales detected
pve.sellLootHint: Sell loot on the market or via contracts to detect it here
pve.startTrackingHint: Start tracking your PVE activities to see statistics

errors.contractZeroPrice: This contract has a price of 0 ISK and cannot be imported as a loot sale
errors.ignoreFailed: Failed to add to ignore list

escalations.title: Escalations
escalations.noEscalationsHint: Add an escalation to start tracking
escalations.listSubtitle: Manage your escalations and export them for sale
escalations.cannotShareNoBm: Cannot share: this escalation is not bookmarked yet.

modal.addSubtitle: Track a DED site for monitoring and sale
modal.notesPlaceholder: E.g.: close to Jita, buyer found...

sellModal.title: Mark as sold?
sellModal.message: The escalation will be marked as sold.

dashboard.noAlerts: No alerts — everything is running smoothly

alerts.jobsReadyDesc: Jobs completed and waiting for pickup
alerts.negativeProfitDesc: Margin at {margin}% — review sell price or ME level

scanner.batchScanPlaceholder: Coming soon — Scan multiple items for profit opportunities
scanner.buyVsBuildPlaceholder: Coming soon — Compare buying vs manufacturing components
scanner.pivotPlaceholder: Coming soon — Find alternative items when margins shift

batch.title: Profit Scanner
batch.subtitle: Analyze profitability of all manufacturable items. Find the best things to build.
batch.infoIskDay: Est. ISK/day = Profit per unit x Daily volume. This is a theoretical maximum assuming you capture 100% of market volume.
batch.infoPrices: Material costs use Jita weighted prices. Job install costs use ESI system cost indices for your selected system. T2 items assume Attainment decryptor. Click any row to open detailed Profit Analyzer.
batch.noResults: No results. Try adjusting filters or run a scan.

buyVsBuild.title: Buy vs Build Advisor
buyVsBuild.subtitle: Each production stage should be profitable on its own
buyVsBuild.searchPlaceholder: Search for a product to analyze...
buyVsBuild.infoNote: Build costs assume ME 10 / TE 20 for intermediate components. Buy prices use Jita weighted average. Job install costs from ESI cost indices.
buyVsBuild.noResult: Search for a product and click Analyze to compare building vs buying components.

pivotAdvisor.title: Pivot Advisor
pivotAdvisor.subtitle: Find alternative products using your current component stockpile
pivotAdvisor.selectProduct: Select a product to analyze pivot options
pivotAdvisor.marginWarning: Margin dropped below 0% — consider pivoting production to an alternative product
pivotAdvisor.noCandidates: No alternative products found sharing components
pivotAdvisor.infoNote: Pivot analysis uses your current asset stockpile. Components from the original project can be redirected to any alternative product. Margin data uses Jita prices refreshed every 2 hours.

slots.title: Slot Tracker

timeline.title: Job Completion Timeline
timeline.hoverHint: Hover bars for details. Bars sorted by completion time.

slots.skillsStaleWarning: Slot limits may be inaccurate. Sync your skills in Settings to see correct slot counts.

project.confirmDeleteMessage: All steps and associated data will be deleted.
project.noProjectsHint: Create a project to get started
project.noProjectsDescription: Create your first industry project to get started

config.maxJobDurationHint: Jobs exceeding this duration will be split automatically

costEstimation.jobInstallNote: Job install costs are estimated based on ESI system cost indices. Actual costs may vary based on facility bonuses and structure rigs.

projectDetail.bpcKitDescription: This action will mark all BPC steps as purchased and set the kit cost.
projectDetail.clearStockDescription: This action will remove all recorded stock data for this project.

bpcKitTab.desiredBpcsHelp: How many successful T2 BPCs you need for this project
bpcKitTab.notT2: This project does not produce a T2 item. No invention data available.
bpcKitTab.applied: BPC Kit cost applied to project

blacklist.title: Blacklist
blacklist.description: Exclude specific categories or items from automatic project decomposition.

skills.title: Production skills
skills.description: Skills are used to calculate production times. Sync from ESI or adjust manually.

favoriteSystems.title: Favorite systems
favoriteSystems.description: Set your preferred systems for manufacturing and reactions.

stepTree.deleteStepConfirm: This step and its sub-steps will be deleted.

structures.title: Production structures
structures.description: Configure your production structures to calculate material bonuses applied to projects.
structures.noCorpStructures: No structures found. Check that corporation assets are synced.
structures.selectOrCustom: Select a structure or leave empty for custom configuration
structures.rigsSharedWithCorp: Configured rigs will be shared with other members of your corporation.
structures.name: Name
structures.noRigsSelected: No rig selected. Search and add rigs to apply bonuses.
structures.bonusPreview: Calculated bonus (base structure + rigs x security)
structures.noStructuresHint: Add your structures to calculate material bonuses
structures.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
structures.editCorpWarning1: This structure is shared with your corporation.
structures.editCorpWarning2: Changes (rigs, type, security) will be visible to all corp members. Continue?

shoppingTab.noMaterials: No materials required for this project
shoppingTab.structureNotSynced: Market data for {name} has not been synced. Use the "Sync" button above.
shoppingTab.duplicateWarning: Potential duplicates: some pasted materials also have linked purchases.
shoppingTab.duplicateHint: Linked purchases may already be in your inventory.
shoppingTab.priceInfo: Volume-weighted prices (Jita Sell + import vs {structure} Sell). Best single-order price shown for comparison.
shoppingTab.noWalletMatch: No wallet transactions matching project materials.
shoppingTab.noLinkedPurchases: No purchases linked to this project.
shoppingTab.pasteStockError: Paste your EVE inventory in the text area
shoppingTab.noItemDetected: No item detected. Check the format (copy from EVE with Ctrl+A then Ctrl+C)
shoppingTab.loadShoppingError: Unable to load the shopping list. Please try again.

margins.selectItem: Search and select an item to analyze profitability
margins.sellComparisonNote: Revenue = unit price x runs. Fees include broker fee + sales tax. Profit = revenue - total cost - fees. Margin = profit / revenue.
margins.inventionFooterNote: "Best Margin" uses the most profitable venue. Total Prod. Cost includes materials + jobs + invention.
margins.t2Note: T2 item detected. ME/TE are set by invention decryptor (select below). Runs per BPC depend on decryptor choice.

stockpile.title: Stockpile Dashboard
stockpile.confirmClearAll: Delete all {count} stockpile targets? This cannot be undone.

empty.title: No stockpile targets set
empty.description: Import targets from a blueprint to start tracking your production pipeline.

mining.title: Mining ledger
mining.subtitle: Mining history and valuation
mining.clickToChangeStatus: Click a row to change its status

settings.corpProjectDescription: Configure how corporation project revenues are accounted for in the ledger.
settings.pveSideDescription: Corp project revenues are deducted from PVE (bounties, loot sold to corp project).
settings.miningSideDescription: Corp project revenues are deducted from mining (ore donated to corp project).
settings.salvageNote: Salvage sold via corp projects is automatically accounted for on the PVE side.

assets.title: Inventory
assets.subtitle: Browse and search your EVE Online assets
assets.name: Name
assets.syncDescription: Your assets are being synced from ESI...
assets.noMatchingItems: No items match the selected filters

visibility.title: Division Visibility
visibility.description: Choose which divisions are visible to corp members
visibility.noDivisionsShared: No divisions shared by a Director

contracts.title: Contracts
contracts.noContractsHint: No contracts match the selected filters

shopping.title: Valuator
shopping.subtitle: Compare prices between Jita and your structure
shopping.pasteLabel: Paste your item list (from the game or in name + quantity format)
shopping.supportedFormats: Formats: Tritanium 10000 / 200x Nocxium / copy-paste from EVE
shopping.sharedExpired: This shared appraisal does not exist or has expired.
shopping.listExpired: This shopping list does not exist or has expired.
shopping.structureNotSynced: Market data for {name} has not been synced.

appraisal.title: Appraisal
appraisal.subtitle: Appraise your items and compare prices across markets -- paste once, see everything.
appraisal.infoBanner: Sell value = cost to buy (lowest sell orders). Buy value = what you receive selling to buy orders (highest buy orders). All prices from Jita 4-4.
appraisal.weightedInfoBanner: Prices shown are volume-weighted (stacking orders to cover the requested quantity). The best single-order price is shown below for comparison.
appraisal.avgDailyVolumeTooltip: Average daily volume on Jita (30 days)
appraisal.importTooltip: Jita sell + transport cost per m3
appraisal.weightedSellTooltip: Weighted sell price based on available sell orders

scheduler.title: Scheduler & Rate Limiting
scheduler.throttleEsi: ESI throttle: progressive under 20 errors remain, pause under 5

settingsModal.title: Notification Preferences
settingsModal.pushDenied: Push notifications were denied by the browser
settingsModal.pushNotSupported: Push not supported by this browser

groupIndustry.title: Group Industry
groupIndustry.subtitle: Collaborative manufacturing projects
groupIndustry.noProjects: No group projects yet. Create one to get started!
groupIndustry.noAvailable: No available projects from your corporation.

contribute.title: Add Contribution
contribute.pendingNote: Your contribution will be reviewed by a project admin.

shareLink.title: Invite Link
shareLink.description: Share this link to invite players to the project.

newProject.title: New Group Project
newProject.subtitle: Create a new multi-item group industry project
newProject.namePlaceholder: Custom project name (e.g. Fleet Doctrine Build)
newProject.itemsPlaceholder: Paste items: ItemName ME TE xRuns (one per line)
newProject.bulkPlaceholder:
Paste items, one per line:
Ferox 2 4 x100
Ishtar 4 8 x50
Sabre 4 8 x200
newProject.noItemsHint: Search for items above or use bulk paste
newProject.containerHint: If set, admins can verify material contributions against this container's contents in shared corp offices.
newProject.blacklistDesc: Items below will be purchased, not manufactured.
newProject.blacklistHint: Defaults from your industry settings. Override per project.
newProject.lineRentalOverrideHint: These rates override your default settings for this project only.
newProject.bomNote: BOM will be aggregated from all items

lineRental.title: Default Line Rental Rates
lineRental.description: These rates are used as defaults when creating new group projects. Each project can override them.

join.title: Join Project
join.description: You have been invited to join this group industry project.
join.alreadyMember: You are already a member of this project.
join.pendingApproval: Your membership request is pending approval.
join.projectNotFound: Project not found or link expired.

available.infoBanner: Projects published by members of your corporation. Join instantly -- no approval needed.
available.emptyHint: No open projects from your corporation at the moment.

empty.title: No group projects yet
empty.description: Create a new project to start collaborating with your corporation.

search.placeholder: Search items... (e.g. Tritanium, Raven, Large Shield Extender)
